title: Generous Joe, Vaccine Made Of HEAVY METAL? 1.6.21
itunes:title: Generous Joe, Vaccine Made Of HEAVY METAL? 1.6.21
description:
In episode 785, Jack and Miles are joined by Dunks and Discourse co-host Jabari Ali Davis to discuss covid cases around the world, the United States messing up the vaccine roll-out, Joe Biden backing the 2k stimulus checks, vaccine conspiracy theories, Trump calling Kelly Loeffler 'Karen,' big city interest dropping, Mr. Bean on 'cancel culture,' and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Tracking coronavirus’ global spread
  2. Unsanitized: America’s Vaccine Rollout Should Infuriate You
  3. Pandemic Aid Bolsters Biden and Shows Potential Path for His Agenda in Congress
  4. FACT CHECK: JOE BIDEN HAS ADVOCATED CUTTING SOCIAL SECURITY FOR 40 YEARS
  5. Pharmacist Accused of Tampering With Vaccine Was Conspiracy Theorist, Police Say
  6. No, there are no microchips in coronavirus vaccines.
  7. Vaccine rumours debunked: Microchips, 'altered DNA' and more
  8. No, COVID-19 vaccines don’t contain Satan’s microchips (and other scary conspiracy theories aren’t true either)
  9. CONSPIRACISTS ACCUSE BILL GATES OF SEEKING MASS STERILIZATION
  10. CONSPIRACY THEORISTS SPREAD ‘5G COVID’ MIND-CONTROL CHIP DIAGRAM THAT IS ACTUALLY A GUITAR PEDAL
  11. Trump accidentally refers to Kelly Loeffler as ‘Karen’ and says he ‘LOVES’ QAnon Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene at rally
  12. Luster of city living drops since 2018: Gallup
  13. ‘Mr. Bean’ Actor Rowan Atkinson Weighs in on ‘Cancel Culture,’ Teases New Film
  14. WATCH: Aquarian Dream - Do You Realize

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
